Package com.flir.flironesdk

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Device.Delegate
    Defines callback methods for device state updates
    Device.PowerUpdateDelegate
    Power-specific callback methods
    Device.StreamDelegate
    Defines callback method for handling stream capture events
    FrameProcessor.Delegate
    Defines callback for frame processing results
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Device
    Represents a connected FLIR ONE device, including the methods for interacting and capturing images and videos from it.
    Frame
    Represents a raw frame received from the camera that can be rendered into a colorized, MSX, or visible-only image with a FrameProcessor instance.
    FrameProcessor
    This class converts from Frame to RenderedImage Processing includes colorizing, MSX fusion, and temperature-accurate thermography.
    RenderedImage
    Represents a rendered image created from a Frame from the device.
    SimulatedDevice
    Created by ibutler on 2015-06-08.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Device.BatteryChargingState
    Represents the state of the battery, if present
    Device.TuningState
    Represents the state of the flat-field calibration tuning
    RenderedImage.ImageType
    Contains all supported frame output formats
    RenderedImage.Palette
    A colorized frame's palette Will be null for non-applicable frame types
